was going to take time for everything to come together under the leadership of Allen Iverson . Try two games. Allen Iverson had 28 points and 13 assists in Denver's 116-105 victory over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. I'd say we're real comfortable with him now, said Tyreke Evans , who had 14 points and 14 rebounds coming off the bench. Allen Iverson picked up his second double-double-- and first win-- since being acquired by Denver for Andre Miller , Joe Smith and two first-round picks

same. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. It's an unhinged one," said Jim Cantiello about the entertaining, unpredictable shenanigans pulled out by Steven Tyler in the first two nights of audition episodes this week. Truth be told, I never realized how much I missed Paula[ Abdul] last year. Steven Tyler 's colorful language, zany metaphors and deafening jangly man-jewelry was just the entertaining wild card the two-night premiere needed to give it a must-see facelift. Jim Cantiello was glad that the new trio, which also includes sole returning judge Randy Jackson, didn"t fall into the same old "mean Simon Cowell " and "too-nice Paula" tropes. responsibility in the company. Earlier all the major strategic decisions were taken by the three of them together. But that is set to change. In a self-authored blogpost Eric Schmidt details about the new roles, Larry will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. Eric Schmidt describes co-founder Sergey Brin as an "innovator and entrepreneur to the core" and rightly so, his role in new and strategic projects would be much needed. He would continue to sport the "co-founder" title
